website_summaries.verdict: The organic bamboo of these breast pads makes them softer and more comfortable.
pros: Comes with a laundry bag for washing
Contoured shape make them smoother under a shirt and more comfortable
Comes in choice of two sizes and either white and beige or multicolored
Can be used with nipple cream
cons: Sometimes these pads can leave your breast moist

customer_reviews.title: Probably wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really on the fence about these, hence the rating. Pros: absorbs great, doesn't leak, super soft and much better during the beginning phase of breastfeeding compared to disposable kinds Cons: the laundry bag is a joke..everything came out of it in the wash, you can DEFINITELY see these through my bra and shirt, even with my thicker bras, they crinkle up and don't lay flat for some reason. Just the fact you can see it through a bra and shirt is reason enough for me to not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie P.

customer_reviews.title: No leaks
customer_reviews.text: I am exstreamly happy with these. I have a 3 month old and can’t gonwithbout nursing pads yet or Inwoild have a wet top every day. I was using disposable until I found these. I spent the same amount of money on a big disposable box as I did on these reusable pads. These are working beautifully. I have had nonleacks and I wash them with my towel laundry. 14 pads is plenty to get me thru 3-4 days and I still have some clean ones left over while I wash the used ones. Thank you for a wonderful and affordable product!
customer_reviews.author: Honeyofsonny

customer_reviews.title: Keep you dry + environmentally friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use these for awhile before leaving a review. I was feeling too guilty using the disposable inserts. I really like these. They are soft, and the convenience of the laundry bag is unbeatable. I leak a lot when I first let down, so these keep me dry, and do not feel clammy or uncomfortable on my skin. The only thing that may bother some people is that if you wear one of the thinner nursing bras under a thinner shirt you definitely see the circle shape of these through your clothing. On days where I wear thinner blouses to work I just have to wear a thicker nursing bra or go with the disposable pads.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Actually waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried reusable nurisng pads in the past and they've never worked. Within 5min I've soaked through them. These were much different! In the beginning during engorgement I'd change them twice a day. Now 3 months into nursing my 3rd and I wear the same pair all day with zero leaks! I'm saving so much money! AND I noticed my nipples were not getting as sore. I'm guessing the chemicals in the disposable pads were irritating and I just never realized it until using these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that these are reusable! They are soft and I haven't had any leaks yet. Yes, you can see the shape of them if too wear a tight shirt but if you having a nursing bra on, it should hide it. I also love the mesh bag, it's great for getting them together in the wash. I do wish it had a strong or something on it so I could hang the bag up inbetween washes so I could just pop the pads in there.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them!!
customer_reviews.text: I soak through them occasionally at night if I'm extra full but that's only happened maybe twice in 2 months. Otherwise I absolutely love them. They are so soft and thick enough to work but not so thick you can see them through my clothes. Just be sure to follow the washing instructions so they dont get bacteria. ( rinse and ring out in cold water so the milk doenst sit in them while they're waiting to go through the washing machine)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I love these breast pads so very much that I'm buying another set for myself & throwing out my crappy cotton ones! They absorb a lot of milk before they actually do leak thru, but for the most part they are leak proof if you are swapping them out as they are getting full. Plus they're soft on my poor sore nipples & don't adhere to me like the cotton ones. This is definitely a must have for moms everywhere & they will be my new go-to gift for baby showers.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This company is the sweetest and sells really good products. I purchased reusable nursing pads and a week after they were delivered I got thrush from my baby. The doctor told me i had to throw everything out because thrush can come back even with a thorough wash. I was super bummed since I had just gotten the pads. I reached out to the company and they were really understanding. They not only sent me another set of pads for free, but they also sent a bamboo waterproof crib mattress as well! Thank you M&Y for valuing your customers and selling quality products!
customer_reviews.author: asim22

customer_reviews.title: Soft, pretty absorbent, good sizes
customer_reviews.text: These are much softer than disposable pads, which was my priority in buying them. I'm not sure they are quite as absorbent--I go through them really quickly, and will probably buy another set so that I'm not always rushing to do laundry to get a new pair. It's great that they come in two sizes. I'm normally an A cup (a bit bigger with pregnancy and nursing) and the medium ones fit nicely in my bra and are about the same size as the disposable ones I used before. The bigger ones, which are a similar size to some other ones that I saw for sale, would have been sticking out of my bra quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I only used these at night or lounging around the house. They were super soft and comfortable especially compared to the disposable ones. I didn’t wear these out and about or all day. They felt to bulky and wouldn’t get me through the day without changing them (inconvenient since I would have to store the dirty ones somewhere). I never once had a problem with mold and was able to wash them once or twice a week whenever I did my laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Great product- no leaks
customer_reviews.text: I liked how I stopped soaking through my bras and shirts once I started using these nursing pads. The heavy duty garment bag for washing was a nice addition as well. The only complaint I have would be the seams, so an unlined bra isn’t recommended with these unless you want to appear to be nipping out. Haha. But definitely worth it to be dry and comfortable and not needing to change clothes multiple times per day.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Rinderknecht

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and not wasteful like the disposable ones.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I like that i'm not using the diaposal ones, minimizing trash. They are soft and comfortable. They have absorbed all my leaks, but so did the disposable ones. Sometimes these will move around a bit because there isnt anything to secure them to my bra. There is also a little bulk to them, so if i wear a thin shirt, you can see them through my non-padded bra. The wash bag they come with is very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have leaked through them two or three times but I wore them all night and slept on my stomach. So yeah, more my fault than the pad. I have found that they get more clean if I wash them not in the bag that came with them, and they have an odd odor if I hang them up to dry so I have to use the dryer. Other than that I love them and I don't plan to use anything else. These do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Worth it to not buy disposable all the time
customer_reviews.text: I got these because the disposable ones were a hassle to constantly buy and seemed sort of wasteful. These have been really absorbent, and in the 5 months I’ve been back at work, I have never had any issues leaking. They are somewhat bulky and can be seen in a sports bra or unlined nursing bra, but they aren’t any worse than a disposable pad. These are also slightly rounded to make them stick to you a little better, so that probably helps. They wash and dry really easy and get softer with washing.
customer_reviews.author: Liana Estep

customer_reviews.title: Saved from packing disposable pads
customer_reviews.text: Threw them in wash with baby clothes in up and up baby detergent. Pads somehow created a perfect seal even when engorged. Placement is key. Absorbs alot when I delay pumping. Yes they may crinkle but you have to adjust your wardrobe when breastfeeding and pumping anyway. I bought nursing tanks from Walmart . Com for like 8 dollars each. Then I put loose tops over them. Putting tight tops on may show a crinkle but it's all about placement. I would have spent lots of money if I would have used disposable pads. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Quesquen

customer_reviews.title: Works well and very soft
customer_reviews.text: I use to buy the disposable nursing pads and then one i realized how dumb it was to keep buying pads and throwing them out when I could just buy some and wash them. I've been using these for about a month now and I love them. They are really absorbent and super soft. I've had no issues washing or drying them.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Honest review from a mama of three
customer_reviews.text: I really love these pads a lot better than the disposable ones. I have large breasts and these pads are very absorbent even when I have a lot of let down.I love that they come with a mesh bag to wash them in. They are even better than I thought they were going to be. I love the quality fabric as they are really soft and do not stick to my skin. This is an honest review from a mama of three. If you are breast-feeding I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.E

customer_reviews.title: To me these are just like bamboobies but you get more bang for your buck ...
customer_reviews.text: Im on maternity leave now and I will be going back to work soon. Im a labor and delivery nurse so I hear babies cry all of the time while I'm at work which means lots of leaking. I needed something strong and dependable. After I had my 2nd child I used bamboobies but those are a little pricey and I'm on a budget. To me these are just like bamboobies but you get more pairs for less and they come in more colors. I tested them out with about 2 oz of water and the other side still remained dry. I also enjoyed the nice email I received from the seller with a very informative breastfeeding guide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last too long
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfy. However, though i followed the washing directions and dried them properly, they've developed a bunch of black dots that seem like mold after just a fe uses. Since it comes in contact with my baby's food I've had to put aside quite a few that look nasty. Im not sure if it will ever come out but I'll keep trying.... also, it sticks to sore nipples which makes it painful to remove. For those that are still in good condition, they're amazingly soft.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Cone shaped and I'm excited to use them
customer_reviews.text: The company was very quick to keep in contact with me before I even received the product which was reassuring to me, should there be any problems I'd be able To get in contact. I haven't used them just yet since I've got a few more weeks to go, but they came in exactly as I expected. I loved that there was a laundry bag they came with and their slightly cone shaped to fit better. I'm sure I'll be happy with them once I have to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing pads
customer_reviews.text: I like these nursing pads a lot and prefer them over the disposable pads. It is so nice that they are machine washable and I just keep the garment bag in my dirty clothes hamper to collect them as I use them. They are very absorbent and so far I have not hand any leaks while wearing them. I have been wearing thin nursing bralettes and the only thing I have noticed is that with a thinner shirt I can sometimes see the silhouette of the pad, but this is to be expected. Overall they are a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Dortch

customer_reviews.title: Great for preventing lanolin stains and leaks!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great for small leaks or keeping the lanolin off of clothes. Though I primarily bought them for keeping the lanolin from staining my clothes (and making them smell!), I have found these to be really absorbent and very good at stopping leaks! I actually prefer these to the disposable ones. The only thing is that I go through the whole pack in like two days... since they’re so cheap, I’ll definitely get another pack!
customer_reviews.author: Shye Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a few days and gone through several pairs. They stop leaks really well. I was woke up in the morning to find a soaking pad, but my bra was dry. The side that touches your skin is a soft terry cloth. They are also discreet. I haven’t been able to see them through my shirt. I’d buy more of these if I ever needed more.
customer_reviews.author: AB92

customer_reviews.title: They shrunk a bit in the wash so I don't feel as covered as I would like so I ordered the large size and am waiting ...
customer_reviews.text: These do absorb, not as much for heavy let downs, the backs of the pads can feel quite moist but they do absorb. They shrunk a bit in the wash so I don't feel as covered as I would like so I ordered the large size and am waiting for those to compare. But to have the extra on hand is good as I'm finding I go through the pads often. A few washes into too and they don't feel as soft as the first time but they don't scratch or are horribly rough, just not as soft as expected long term wise
customer_reviews.author: Joolee

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, but home use only for me!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality, very soft and absorbent. Easy to wash and dry. Customer service is superb too, they let me exchange the size so easily. I have a couple complaints though: - they stay wet once they get wet. The disposable kind gelatinize and dry once after getting wet. - they don't stay in place. It's uncomfortable when they're in the wrong spot and then embarrassing in public when I have to adjust them. I only wear them at home now. In the end I'm still satisfied with my purchase and will keep using them!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, not absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These nursing pads are very soft and I would recommend them based on that alone. I think disposable ones (even cheap, scratchy store brand ones) are more absorbent and the bag they came in is coming apart at the seam after a single wash. Also, my area sticks to these and I’ve never had that happen with disposables. Edited to add another star. After the company followed up with me as a general practice, I informed them of the issue with the laundry bag. They quickly resolved the issue, and I am grateful for the wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Steph L.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these nursing pads! They are contoured and a great size. The disposable ones were so itchy, but these don't usually bother me. Sometimes the fabric gets a bit hard & scratchy if I leak a lot of milk, but when freshly laundered they are soft. I've never leaked through - not even close. I love the colors! Easy to wash! And they come with both a storage bag (where I keep the clean ones) and a small laundry bag (where I throw used ones) which makes it easy to wash & not lose them. Fantastic product! Love the bags!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, I decided to stop wasting money on the disposable ones and try these. The only problem is that they are tiny. I took medium size since I don't have large breasts but they are much smaller than the disposable ones. They will probably shrink even more after the dryer. I'm disappointed. I would recommend anyone to take the large size. The big plus about this is the washing machine bag. I tend to lose tiny things in my washing machine so I'm excited to put them in the bag this way I wont lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Irene.K

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I loved these. They were very soft, comfortable, and absorbent. The only problem I had was that the mesh bag they sent with it for washing was not nearly big enough for them to get clean in my washer. One time I used it and pulled them out of the wahser to smell and see if soap had made it through all the pads and they smelled of old milk still. I had much better luck hand washing or just tossing them all in the washer separate.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for going on 2 months now and they are holding up great. I hand washed them at first but to be honest you don't have to. They have held up great and I never leaked with them so far. The back is a different material which seems to hold liquid good. They do discolor a little but they are great at doing their job.
customer_reviews.author: Kalmia

customer_reviews.title: Love these breast pads!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for about 2 weeks now and love them. They are very soft against my skin. They stay in place nicely. I got the medium size ones which are the same skate as the bamboobies I have, I feel they are the perfect size. I wouldn't count on 14 of them lastin you a whole week though as you should change them when they get wet to prevent any issues with your breasts. I would buy these again in a heart beat. They are way more comfortable than disposables and I'm glad I'm not just adding to landfills.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: I received these today and couldn't wait to tear into them. I used disposable pads for my first two babies because I really wanted something contoured and didn't like the flat reusable ones I had bought. Plus, they were itchy. But these, THESE have changed my mind about reusable pads. They are soft, comfy, CONTOURED, and affordable. They are already doing well at absorbing leaking, and I have a very strong let-down. I'll update once I get some time with them (washing them, nighttime use, etc), but I am so far very impressed. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Frenzied Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely lumpy under sheer bras. But, I wear them under my padded bra and you can't see that I have them on at all. Plus, they are absorbent, comfortable, and easy to wash. I use a mesh hosiery bag to wash mine since the bag provided is too small. However, the provided bag does make for a good place to store them in my bra drawer. I also dry these on one of those hanging dryer things with the clips instead of putting them in the dryer which works well.
customer_reviews.author: Modrocker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a couple reasons. I Hate wearing nursing pads around the house because they are not comfortable, but I was tired of Being a slob and leaking all over myself haha. Plus I wanted to reduce waste (from disposable nursing pads) and save money). These are so soft and comfortable. They don’t itch. They seem to absorb a lot without leaking. Only thing is they do show through your shirt slightly if you are wearing a thin bra, but not too bad. They also have a year warranty by the company that makes them, but I doubt I’ll have to use it. These are a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Get the bigger size!
customer_reviews.text: Get the bigger size! I’m a small girl...115lbs and had a 30b bra size pre pregnancy. Although nursing my boobs didn’t get much bigger just fuller. I like these reusable pads for many reasons, less waste and they don’t stick to my boobs like the disposable ones lol. But because I ordered the smaller size I’m always having to adjust them cause they slide around in my nursing bra’s and tanks.
customer_reviews.author: LA Demo

customer_reviews.title: Not leak proof
customer_reviews.text: From t5h reviews I was depending on these for absorbency, but I was disappointed. If you ever leak a lot, this won't help you. I intended on leaving a good review, but last night I woke up in a small puddle after I leaked in my sleep, which doesn't usually happen and these pads were soaked (didn't have this problem with disposables). They are absorbent if you don't leak much and they definitely aren't flattering. They aren't all that soft, but I washex them before first use and that seemed to soften them a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice for Nursing Pads
customer_reviews.text: I used these all the time for the first two months and they kept my bra from getting soaked in milk. The large is very large; not recommended unless you are a large-breasted woman. I got the mediums on my second order and they worked perfectly for me. They saved me from a lot of embarrassment and wet clothes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blandford

customer_reviews.title: I love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I held off on writing a review until I'd used these for awhile...it's been a grew months since my son was born and I use these day and night!! I've never leaked once (even in those very early days when the milk first comes in) and through weekly washings (of all the pads) they still look and preform as if brand new. Wasn't sure how to wash them at first, as they came with no specific instructions, so I've just been throwing them in with my baby's wash using dye and fragrance free detergent on cold setting and dye and fragrance free dryer sheets on a low setting.
customer_reviews.author: K. Publy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the peel and stick disposable pads to use right after my daughter was born. I didnt think I would go through so many so fast, and quickly realized I needed a better solution. Enter these! They are durable and soak up leaking milk easily - I haven't had any get through to my shirts at all. Easy to clean - at the end of each day I put them in the mesh laundry bag and the whole bag goes in the washer at the end of each week. Way better for the environment and my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: TKS

customer_reviews.title: I love these nursing pads
customer_reviews.text: I love these nursing pads. I do wish they were a little thinner or less obvious through my bra and shirt, but they are still really comfortable and VERY absorbent. I over produce milk and this product works GREAT! I, also, love the mesh bag that they come with for the wash, it makes it really easy to keep track of them. Just don't wash too many at the same time, they can take a couple of cycles through the dryer to dry all the way to the ones in the middle, but that shouldn't really be a problem if you wash a couple with every load, instead of almost all at once like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Breastfeeding Necessity
customer_reviews.text: These are really soft and absorbent. I only notice leaks onto my bra but not through my clothes when I wear them for long periods overnight that’s the only reason I gave that a 4 star review. They’re really awesome and easy to wash in their storage bag. I’m really contemplating buying more to cut down on washing them so frequently. Great for new breastfeeding moms. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mk3

customer_reviews.title: Needed a lot more than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to use these long term because I leaked too much. I had to soak them before running them through the laundry because a smell lingered even if I rinsed them out with water after use. I was excited to use these but went through 7 pairs in a day. Held a good amount before leaking through. Will find another use around the house for them and keep them as a spare for when I run out of disposable ones in between purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Tang

customer_reviews.title: Best breast pads I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I will use them every time I have a baby. I have been breastfeeding for a year and these have lasted, still in great condition! I don’t leak through them, they are comfortable and easy to wash. 100% recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Rinner

customer_reviews.title: Not absorbant enough at all!
customer_reviews.text: While these are comfortable, they hold almost nothing and have ended up being a total waste of money. After repeatedly waking up wet having leaked through these pads and repeatedly leaking through them while nursing ( baby on one breast and leaking through on the other) I called it quits and switch to disposable. I wanted these to work so badly, but I couldn’t keep using these when they weren’t even working while I am still at home on maternity leave. There is no way I’m relying on these in public or back at work!
customer_reviews.author: Shannay I

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SOFT AND ABSORBENT!  HIGH QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use disposable pads, but it started to get ridiculous having to throw away pads and continuously buying more boxes of pads. I decided to give washable nursing pads a try and I wish I had done this sooner. These are super soft and absorbent. I bought one pack to start and bought another pack so that I would have more than six pairs. I have washed them several times already and they are in great condition still. I use the mesh bag to store the pads, not to wash them in. I highly recommend these nursing pads.
customer_reviews.author: CLT

customer_reviews.title: stays in place
customer_reviews.text: These are the best reusable nursing pads that I have tried. They stay drier than the bamboobies brand. I haven't had any issues with leaking through them. Depending on how much I'm leaking, I can normally use the same one through the night, but I will sometimes need to replace them when I nurse in the middle of the night. These generally are pretty breathable, but I do alternate with disposable pads since they stay drier than any of the reusable pads I've tried. I have large boobs (36G plus milk) and have had problems with other pads staying on my nipple, these do a good job of staying in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Payne/Rebecca Loeffler

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend, leaked all over
customer_reviews.text: I really had high hopes for these since they had such a good rating but boy am I disappointed. First night I wore them, I woke up with my right side soaked. Then I wore them the next night and my whole left side was soaked. I was out of disposable nursing pads so I had to wear these to work and was anxious all day that they were gonna leak. I ended up stuffing a cut up pad in my bra to prevent any embarrassing leaks. The interior is soft and nice up against your skin but they don't do the job at ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Not leak proof
customer_reviews.text: Wife says it leaves her feeling wet. She has to change them out once or twice a day & wakes up soaked every morning because our 4 month old sleeps through the night. So most days she wears 4 of these pads. After washing the correct way with no softener how the instructions have said they’re not as soft & absorbent. They also move all around if you wear a nursing cami. Over all disappointed to have purchased more pads that are not leak proof. Supposedly these are supposed to help save you money by being machine washable but that’s not helpful if it doesn’t do what is claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua P.

customer_reviews.title: Saving Money and The Environment... Sorta
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a few weeks now. These are great during the day, but at night, they move, which gets kinda messy. BUT they are still saving me money, because I split the bill by only needing disposable at night. Now I’m only renewing every 2 months instead of 1. They have held up well in the wash: with regular clothes, warm/cold, light heat drying. They definitely don’t feel good when super wet, and if they dry on your nipple, it hurts to peel off, so don’t let that happen. They do a good job though.
customer_reviews.author: MoMaLa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love the breastpads I purchased! Tge quality is great and the wash bag was a nice bonus. I was given bamboobies breast pads as a gift and have not been pleased with them. I find myself pushing those to the bottom of the drawer to reach for these pads. I will be buying more so I can get the other brand out of my circulation. I love these! They are soothing on my nipples and they don't stick to me after I leak.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great for saving money!
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I bought these before I had my baby, because as soon as my milk came in I was a fountain! These are great I usually can wear one pair for about 12 hours before I need to change them & I can easily wash them with my normal laundry. I have been putting them in the dryer and haven't noticed an issue. I usually know when it's time to change them because I get itchy & it's quite damp, and starting to leak though.
customer_reviews.author: The Lancours

customer_reviews.title: Ok product, FALSELY ADVERTISED-NO bonus gift, NO customer service at all
customer_reviews.text: Products are normal, doing its job that absorb breast milk but leak as the pads move around in bras. Pad size is smaller than expected but the colors look good. Pads shrink after washing and takes quite some time to dry. Plus, products are FALSELY ADVERTISED. There are no bonus/extra gift as mentioned in the product title/name. I already contacted seller but messages were ignored. I regret spending more money to purchase these rather than other products which are same quality but cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: So soft! I've now ordered another set, so innever have to be without them.
customer_reviews.text: There are very few things I review. But these... they are awesome. Soft and gentle in your nipples. I have a bit of damage and after using the Lansinoh nursing pads I ordered these (mainly because I felt bad about the waste, but also beacause in the middle of the night I'd often manage to put the sticky side in my breast 😂) I also noticed how rough the disposable ones were after using these. I've ordered another set just in case I'm behind in washing, so I never have to go back to diposable pads. Def worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah-Jane Casey

customer_reviews.title: Really wished they worked out
customer_reviews.text: These reusable pads are a wonderful idea and I was so excited and used them for a while. The upside is that they are reusable and super easy to clean. The problem is they stay moist and keep you moist. That is a BIG problem when breastfeeding. Staying moist like this can cause yeast! Getting yeast can cause your baby to get thrush and this is not fun for mom or baby at all and can actually be quite painful. Unfortunately, I am going to be sticking with the disposable pads which are absorbent but unfortunately can get pricy over time. I really wish these ended up working out. They could have saved me a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Proverbs 31

customer_reviews.title: Creating mold on them
customer_reviews.text: They do not leak and they seem to be good quality. However, I have been using and washing them for over a month now but a few of them have created some mold on them. Where I live, you hang your clothes to dry so we do not own a dryer but this has never happened to any of my clothes before. After a few washes, I noticed that a couple of pairs have developed what looks like mold. I will not be using them again and will be purchasing different ones
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric and excellent choice for taking care of the planet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product plus using it you take care of the environment by not using the disposable ones. Every breastfeeding mom should use this in order to contribute with their little one future on this planet. Every action towards counts. Great fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria M. Jimenez Jourdain

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They're super soft, easy to clean, and don't make me itch like disposable pads. Update: I've been using these 2 months now, and haven't once experienced a leak through! I just purchased another set because I love them so much I decided I needed more on hand. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: rkarlson1

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: These nursing pads are worth the money. I haven’t leaked through, they are super easy to clean, and usually I can’t even tell they’re there. Plus, it’s nice only paying once for these instead of repeatedly having to buy the disposable ones.
customer_reviews.author: Stormie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable nursin pads
customer_reviews.text: The nursing pads were great. My biggest concern was that the cotton was going to leave a residue on my nipple which I then would have to pick off before nursing every time. No issue with the residue. So happy about that. The nursing pads are nice size, not to small or big. They do leak a little, but more laziness on my end.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wade

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love! I have an oversupply so I need to wear pads. I also have skin allergies and have zero issues with these!! Washes really well. They come with a cute laundry bag but I just throw them in separate with my whites. Just ordered my second batch to get me through a week better! Would recommend to any breastfeeding mama.
customer_reviews.author: Jan C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, high quality, long-lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Wife writes: very comfortable product and eco-friendly option! The pad feels good against the skin and holds the milk very well. I have been using them for 2 months now without any problems whatsoever! I also love the laundry mesh bag that comes with it and makes washing so easy. No problem of the pads getting mold or stinking with long term use. I do make sure that these come out completely dry from the dryer. Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Arup

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would NEVER buy anything else in the future other than these. Disposables don’t come anywhere close to the comfort, softness and leak proof of these. Also after MANY washes they just get softer and are still just as absorbent. Never have a bad smell after being washed. And not having to spend somewhere around $7 a box for disposables is pretty nice! Considering there’s diapers, wipes and sanitary pads to purchase on the regular, I really like having one less thing to worry about! The price for these is fantastic for the amazing product you get. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Poplips

customer_reviews.title: Holy absorbentsy
customer_reviews.text: These are so absorbent and because the back is “waterproof “ they don’t leak super fast!!! I have other reusable ones and they leak almost instantly and I go through like 6 disposables a day and only 1-2 sets of these a day!!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to disposable
customer_reviews.text: These work great, they do need changed often so plan on washing at least once every other day. They have leaked through onto my shirt several times. They are also pretty easily seen through a lightweight shirt. Still love them and still use daily.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaof2

customer_reviews.title: Great product & price point
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Just get the large for peace of mind lol While they’re plenty absorbent, they aren’t as soft as the bamboobies hearts. Both brands still get hard and uncomfortable after leaks dry up. But! This pack comes with so many that it’s not a problem to keep changing them throughout the day 🙂
customer_reviews.author: ASLL

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: They aren’t the most comfortable nursing pads. Hoping they’ll soften after a few more washes but the inside is sort of rough, for a lack of better word. Not actually rough, just uncomfortable against tender skin. Definitely not soft. And the seams are kinda bulky..gives it an ununiform shape. They do absorb though. I don’t leak a ton however so I don’t need anything ultra absorbent. My son did sleep longer than usual the other night though and I woke up drenched, so i would only wear these for daytime use from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W

customer_reviews.title: They do the job. Meh.
customer_reviews.text: These pads do the job, but they are a little bulky and don't conform to your breast shape (they have ripply edges), so it's possible to see the shape through your shirt unless your bra is really thick. The washing bag is a nice addition, but you can't fit that many pads into it to wash them all at once. I just use a different, bigger delicates bag. Also, a friend bought me the Bamboobies nursing pads and they are much softer (relief for your nipples) and lay flat. I'd recommend those over these, but the bamboobies are indeed more expensive, and possibly don't hold as much milk.
customer_reviews.author: N.S.Harker

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! Sticks to nipples!!!
customer_reviews.text: These stuck to my nipples and I have to painstakingly tear them off each nipple every time, definitely something you do not want to endure while your nipples are super sore from starting breastfeeding. They are Also scratchy on my nipples. They also aren’t that absorbent for how bulky they are. I can see the outline of them through my shirt under my bra. Ouch is all I can say about these, I do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I loved these while I was pregnant and after. I just washed them with my other delicate stuff in a white laundry bag. I never had any issues. I would highly recommend them! Great for whenever your milk starts to come in.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: They are great for keeping your bra and clothes from getting milk ...
customer_reviews.text: They are great for keeping your bra and clothes from getting milk on them, the milk does not soak through but you have to change them several times a day. It seems like I leak more with these than disposable pads, maybe because these ones move around and don't stay in 1 place like disposable though. I definately recommend this product but I recommend buying another set of them as well.
customer_reviews.author: heather sinkler

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my fourth baby so I've used some nursing pads. I'm super stoked about these and they even come with a nice zippered mesh bag to wash them in (no more losses in the maw of the washer!). They seem very well made and the little washing bag is the icing!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Dennee

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: These only work for me because I have a very padded bra. Otherwise I would hate them because they aren't contoured at all and pucker up. They are comfortable and soft and I don't realize they are there. They absorb well but I don't leak a ton either. I like the washable bag but I use it for storage instead and got a bigger laundry bag so I felt they were getting a little bit more clean not being stacked on top of each other so tightly. Im a size DD or E and the large covers perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Soft and worth it.
customer_reviews.text: First I will start with these feel so much better than the disposable Avent pads I was using. I ordered the Large after reading a lot of reviews but I wish I hadn't. I took out all of the padding in my nursing bras and am able to just use these which is nice. They are very soft on my breasts until my milk gets in them and dries. It's not too big of a deal I just have to reposition and it is fine. The largest were just a little too big and bunch up in my bra.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These pads are amazing! They definitely catch the excess milk from being engorged & it doesn't seep through the pads. It comes with a washer bag but I've washed them +10 times without the bag & they're still holding up. Way better than buying the disposable pads because you can wash & reuse them. I'm actually going to purchase more because they work so great!!! Must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maile

customer_reviews.title: Less waistful
customer_reviews.text: These are nice to use as you feel less wasteful then disposable pads, however I have to change these at least once in a 6-8hour period or else they leak if not changed. That might just be me. If you don't leak a lot this work great, even if you do they work great too, just make sure you are keeping an eye on them. Also wash them as soon as possible as they start to smell and move them from the washer to the dryer quickly as they smell musty if they have been left wet too long, even when they are dried
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for leaks and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Does show a bit under tight shirts, but oh well!! For those of us with lots of milk (I'm basically a Holstein milk cow), when let down happens and theres no baby to help, oh boy do I leak!!!! These pads were incredible and irreplaceable. I love that they are washable and reusable!!!
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Very absorbent and soft. I also designated a couple of them to soak them in warm water and give my little one sponge baths and he loves it. They are a little thick so they easily show if wearing light clothing or under a thin bra, but this is something that was int he description before I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: patti tellez

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for nursing mommas
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these so much better than cotton hold more and dont feel yuck when they soak up the milk and dont hold an oder either actually feel dry when wearing these verses cotton pads
customer_reviews.author: jeanet bergbigler

customer_reviews.title: Nice Alternative to Disposable Nursing Pads
customer_reviews.text: These nursing pads have been a nice alternative to the disposable ones. They've gone through a few washes now, and for the most part serve their purpose. I'm on my third baby and have had more milk leaks this time around - I usually go through one set per day. However, there have been a few times where I've completely soaked through a pad. They are not completely discreet under certain bras/shirts, but overall they were a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Berg

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It does the job! There is no adhesive, but it doesn't shift much when you wear. Washing is simple, even though I don't use the bag included. They don't get any more lost than little kid socks, and wash and dry better when loose. A bit of a wet feeling when you put it back in the bra after a feeding, but nothing major. I like to get a clean pair 2 or 3 times a day, though, so maybe I need more of them :)
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Cannot even last 5hrs of wear during the day
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - comfortable, soft - good shape, depending on which pad in the package, some are undetectable under my nursing tops, other ones were slightly noticeable - did not feel wet/damp/cold when wearing them Cons: - could not handle 5hr wear during the day, leaked through my top, although I did not feel wet (see picture) Does it work? Yes, if you replace them every 3-4 hrs or so (but who has time for that?) Can it replace disposables? No Would I buy again? No
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype..
customer_reviews.text: Although this product is great when you want to keep buying disposable nursing pads, they aren’t really worth 5 stars because the fabric gets caught in your nips and I have to make sure my baby won’t be suckling the lint. Also, it kind of sticks to your sensitive nipples and it sort of painful when you’re peeling yourself off of it. Bottom line, I would still prefer the disposable nursing pads instead of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: New curved pad isn't great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 3 years ago with my first pregnancy, the pads were flat. Now they are curved to fit to your boob but constantly make you look like you have a THO. Bought these many times as baby shower gifts but not anymore. The curved fit isn't great. I only have the pad on my left breast in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're alright..
customer_reviews.text: This is the second reusable pads I've used and I don't feel these are as good ad the others. They bunch fairly easily but my biggest frustration is the leaking. They definitely do not hold up in terms of any form of let down for me and keeping the moisture off my skin amd beyond that easily leaks through and ultimately through the rest of my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: HHJ

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used better....
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft or as smooth as other pads I’ve worn. I wear them at home, but i cannot wear them when I go out in public. Also, a little on the smaller side, so if I do a lot of bending and moving throughout the day, it moves off my nipple - so I tend to leak through. They do absorb a lot, if they stay put!
customer_reviews.author: On Baby Time

customer_reviews.title: Best busting pads I have used in 6 kids!!
customer_reviews.text: These are much better quality and absorb better than any I have had previously and I am currently nursing my 6th baby. I am ordering a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Is a "must" if you are breast feeding
customer_reviews.text: I use them every day and night and they really protect my nipples! If I only use the brad without this covers, I will feel my nipples kind of soar at the end of the day, so I use them every time to protect my nipples! This is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best breast pads I own
customer_reviews.text: These pads are so soft and absorbent. The multi-colors you obviously cannot see through the bra, but help you stay organized as far as which are in the wash, etc. The way the are stitched provide a natural shape that fits to the breast that helps with comfort. If you're going to buy reusable breast pads, these are it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz F.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, comes w a zip up wash bag
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, get the job done and come wth a handy little wash bag to help prevent losing them! They definitely show a bit under certain clothes/using certain bras, but that’s true for all nursing pads really, esp the reusable...well worth the money spent, one set of pads works all day at work, no leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Bwalk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these well in advance from needing them. I waited to submit my review until I received them. Upon inspection, they are incredibly well made and the quality is great. I received an email from the company explaining the proper way to wash and dry them, which was very nice. I then received an additional email with a follow-up check in to ensure everything was okay. Very pleased with the purchase, and the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend with one small reservation
customer_reviews.text: They are super soft and absorbent. They are on the smaller side which is nice for some of the lower rise bras/ tops I wear them bc it ensures they won’t pop out over the top for the world to see. other times they can be “too small” bc if they move around at all (left or right) they are not covering the nipple which defeats the whole purpose but typically I can feel when they are moving so I fix it before it becomes an issue. Overall they work as expected and are super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m quite happy with these-I ordered them as “wear around the house” ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m quite happy with these-I ordered them as “wear around the house” pads since I have always needed the security of disposable pads in public, but these are absorbent enough that I feel confident to wear them out in public! As other reviewers have mentioned, they do show through nursing tanks and tighter shirts-so plan accordingly. I’m also pleased with the amount of pads you get for the price and the bonus washing bag! I plan on getting these for a friend when she has her next baby.
customer_reviews.author: WyomingMom

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for a few hours and I had already leaked through all the way to my shirt. They are quite small even though labeled “large.” They barely covered my nipples and there is nothing to hold them in place in the bra so they very easily shift around causing additional leakage. I am returning them and just going to use disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful breast pads
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought these. The disposable pads really irritate my skin after a while. These are soft, comfortable and easy to clean. The laundry bag that comes with is wonderful too!
customer_reviews.author: Zhia

customer_reviews.title: They do not lay totally flat
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty nice. If you use them under a thin shirt or bra, they poke out a bit, making it look like you have hard nipples. But if used under a nursing bra it won't be noticeable. Just don't wear them under a cami alone. They have held up well in the washer/dryer.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these nursing pads!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. With my first child,I used disposable nursing pads. Either reusable ones weren't available back then or I didn't know about them, but these ones are fabulous. They never leak. EVER. They are so soft, and so absorbent. I hated the disposables because they'd leak as often as not, and they felt horrible. The only thing I wish is that someone would invent a 3D nursing pad with a concave shape so it'd actually lay flat under a bra instead of puckering at the edges, but apart from that, the construction and functionality of these organic bamboo ones are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeP78

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: These are very absorbent and I like the smaller size that they are because they don't keep folding over in my bra and causing discomfort. They are great quality too.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to disposable pads
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these because the first set worked so well. I used to use disposables but changed to these and it has been great! The only thing is, depending on what kind of top you are wearing (like if it’s a thinner material), you can see the outline. That is the only con I’ve experienced so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Used disposable with my first kids. Switched to these for my third baby. They work perfectly and are soft and comfortable. Much better than disposable.
customer_reviews.author: E.N.

customer_reviews.title: I love these nursing pads
customer_reviews.text: I love these nursing pads!!! My new baby is a cluster feeder so when my milk came, it came abundantly. Not only are they subtle, they're so soft that they are very soothing. The fabric breathes better than disposable nursing pads so its easier to stay a bit cooler. What a great buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anola Blevins
